summary: An email dated August 12, 2019, reporting the number of overtime occurrences for a specific week (August 3-10, 2019) at a facility, likely related to staffing or security operations. The sender is a Regional Director for the Northeast Region.

events.title: Overtime Occurrences Reporting Period

keyFacts: The document is an email dated August 12, 2019, reporting overtime occurrences from August 3-10, 2019.
Daily overtime occurrence counts are listed, ranging from 22 to 35, with a note clarifying these are occurrences, not hours.
The sender identifies as the Regional Director for the Northeast Region, indicating this is an internal operational report.
